summary: This document is a search and seizure warrant issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York. It authorizes law enforcement to search a specific residence for evidence related to violations of sex trafficking laws, particularly concerning minors. The warrant outlines the items to be seized, including electronic devices and records related to the offenses.

persons.name: Henry Pitman
persons.context: Henry Pitman issued the search and seizure warrant for the premises located at 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York.

events.title: Execution of Search Warrant
events.description: Law enforcement is commanded to execute the search warrant on or before July 12, 2019.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The search warrant is related to violations of Title 18, United States Code, Sections 371 and 1591, concerning sex trafficking of minors.
The warrant authorizes the seizure of electronic devices and storage media that may contain evidence of the offenses.
The executing officer is required to prepare an inventory of the seized items and return the warrant to the Clerk of the Court.
